DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Impairment Loss, Annual Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss, Net of Tax
GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of loss recognized that results from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

UndistributedEarnings.label: Undistributed Earnings, Basic
UndistributedEarnings.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAtFairValue.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAtFairValue.description: The aggregate fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities. Includes both pledged and unpledged holdings.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFairValueDisc.label: Finite-lived Intangible Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFairValueDisc.description: Fair value portion of assets, excluding financial assets, that lack physical substance, having a limited useful life.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital
IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Fair Value Disclosure
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.description: Fair value portion of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Fair value of share-based awards for which the grantee gained the right by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash.
